job.command:
starver SL10k
cons EXTRA_CPPFLAGS=-fpermissive
set minVr = 0.0 set maxVr = 2.0 set minVz = -200 set maxVz = 200 set minVx = -999 set maxVx = -999 set minVy = -999 set maxVy = -999 set beamSpotX = .39 set beamSpotY = -0.06 set minPrimaryTracks = 2 set maxVertices = 1 set badRunRejection = 1 set runTime = 250
set nEvents = 999999
root4star -q -b RunStDataCollectorMaker.C\($nEvents,\"$FILELIST\",\"$SCRATCH/\",\"$JOBID\",$minVr,$maxVr,$minVz,$maxVz,$minVx,$maxVx,$minVy,$maxVy,$beamSpotX,$beamSpotY,$minPrimaryTracks,$maxVertices,$badRunRejection,$runTime\)
